definition: human sympathy/humanitarianism/humane/the "human way", one of the stages in the cycle of reincarnation (Buddhism)/sexual intercourse

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
no use to tell others/let's keep this between ourselves (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 zu2 wei2 wai4 ren2 dao4

sentences.english: There are also humanitarian uses for sniffer bees.
sentences.chinese: 嗅探蜂還能應用於人道主義援助。

sentences.english: Nobility and dignity of people is the core values of humanitarian.
sentences.chinese: 人的高貴和尊嚴是人道主義的核心價值。

sentences.english: Nowadays，it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers of sailors.
sentences.chinese: 今天，鞭笞抗命士兵或水手是不人道的懲罰。

sentences.english: The fascists massacred those women and children in cold blood.
sentences.chinese: 法西斯分子慘無人道地屠殺了那些婦女兒童。

sentences.english: Yeah, the killer was completely unfeeling. He even killed old ladies!
sentences.chinese: 看了，那個殺手真是慘無人道，連老太太都殺。

sentences.english: We seldom have a holiday. It is out of humanity to make up the fucuking missed lessons.
sentences.chinese: 難得放假，卻讓我們補課補得死去活來，真不人道。

sentences.english: What we have done is in full accord with the humane spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我們所做的一切都是完全符合人道精神的。

sentences.english: Nations have tried feebly to humanize war.
sentences.chinese: 許多國家想促使戰爭人道化，可是沒有效。

sentences.english: During this change, humanism has greatly influenced people's thought and behavior.
sentences.chinese: 人類的人道精神在這變化中發揮了極其重要的作用。

sentences.english: The minimum wage is not just about the economy, but humanity.
sentences.chinese: 最低工資不單是經濟問題，也是人道問題。

sentences.english: TYPICAL USE:Nowadays, it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers or sailers.
sentences.chinese: 先進，鞭笞不服從的兵士或水手是不人道的懲罰。

sentences.english: Which you agreed to do, being the humanitarian sort you are.
sentences.chinese: 這你也同意了，作爲一個像你這樣的人道主義者。

sentences.english: In the value system of legal social work, the key idea is humanitarianism.
sentences.chinese: 在法律社會工作價值體系中，其核心理念是人道主義。

sentences.english: How can she come with such non-humanitarian words?
sentences.chinese: 她怎麼能說出如此不人道的話？

sentences.english: Both of these two types of humanitarianism are responsible for the chaotic situation in education and society.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種人道主義要爲教育和社會領域的混亂無序負責。

sentences.english: These humanitarians often brave great danger, far from home.
sentences.chinese: 人道主義工作者往往冒着極大的危險，遠離家庭。

definition: to clean the street/to clear the road (i.e. get rid of people for passage of royalty or VIP)
Heaven's law/the natural order of things
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
